====
last
====

.. js:function:: last() 

**domain**: client 

**language**: javascript

**class** :doc:`Item class </refs/client/item_api>`

Description
===========

Call ``last`` to position the cursor on the last record in the item dataset and 
make it the active record. 

See also
========

:doc:`Dataset </programming/data/dataset>`

:doc:`Navigating datasets </programming/data/navigating_datasets>`
